website_summaries.verdict: A heavy duty, gun-style hose nozzle that can be used in extreme temperatures (hot or cold).
pros: Since the pressure of the water is dependent on how tightly you squeeze the trigger, this model can be fully operated with one hand
The nozzle features a metal core for increased durability, an ergonomic grip, and a Stainless steel locking clip
cons: Although the main selling point is one-handed operation, some users find it difficult to maintain a consistent pressure solely by squeezing

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last long .....
customer_reviews.text: I DID like this product until it broke. I purchased it April14 and on July 18 the handle split on top. It can not be repaired and will not work at all like that. I never do much as dropped it hard. Kept it in the shade and used it to water plants every other day just for a couple minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Winner!
customer_reviews.text: Solid and comfortable sprayer. Much better than the cheap alloy metal ones... I have Parkinson's and my hands are messed up. This fits my hand and is comfortable to use. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice spay nozzle
customer_reviews.text: Nice spay nozzle. Key feature for me is one-handed operation to go from mist to stream, depending on how far you press the trigger. This is used for car washing and I need the fan/blast option constantly. These last two summers for me. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: N. George

customer_reviews.title: These seemed great at first but then the problems began
customer_reviews.text: These seemed great at first but then the problems began. The threaded part at bottom where hose screws in is a cheap lead type ring that is glued in. After using a couple of months the glue fails and water shoots everywhere. These are good looking but junk. DO NOT BUY!!!! I know I have 5 of them and 3 have failed within a few months.
customer_reviews.author: SteveO

customer_reviews.title: Made well of metal works well
customer_reviews.text: I have had many different hose spray heads over the years, most plastic and last 1 year tops .Most other hose nozzles have different spray modes like steam , flood , shower ect . This item is made weight well of metal and does what a good old fashion nozzle does . The spray is controlled by simply turning the nozzle. It’s very basic but well made . Hopefully last quite longer. I would definitely recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: susan johnson

customer_reviews.title: The picture was deceiving.
customer_reviews.text: The picture was deceiving. I was looking for the adjustable nozzle which it was not. The construction looked pretty sturdy. I returned it without using.
customer_reviews.author: Cotick Somick

customer_reviews.title: Quality made, love that it comes with rubber washer
customer_reviews.text: Needed a basic style hose nozzle that wasn’t metal. This one is even better than the one we had prior and we were happy to see it came with the rubber washer to help keep it from leaking. It seems extremely durable and should last us a long time.
customer_reviews.author: FLMomOf3

customer_reviews.title: Finally, rubber coated AND metal handle
customer_reviews.text: Most hose ends are either all metal -- to hot to leave in the AZ sun, or rubber coated handle and PLASTIC trigger which means they will last 1 year, maybe 2 before they crack/fail in the sun. This one has a rubber coated metal trigger and rubber coated handle. I expect it to last twice as long or more as the other styles.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hunkler

customer_reviews.title: 90% good + 10% junk = 100% garbage
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with the metal palm trigger (I see a customer picture with a different plastic trigger), the metal is such thin gauge it EASILY bent and deformed so it no longer holds the plunger well enough to actuate the nozzle. Such a shame when a weak link like this makes the hole product WORTHLESS.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Seems durable, time will tell
customer_reviews.text: I have a large yard and go through hose nozzles. They seem to break a lot and I wanted an inexpensive option, since they can also disappear from my yard. The Melnor nozzle was well priced and seemed well made. Once delivered, it also appeared well made and has lasted for a while. Time will tell - but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Mixed Desmid

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Caution, this nozzle is not made for outdoor use. After only one month the metal components have rusted so badly it doesn’t function properly. Probably made in China
customer_reviews.author: JOHN J BREWBAKER

customer_reviews.title: sprayer
customer_reviews.text: very good product --i use plumbers tape when i install it on the hose
customer_reviews.author: Richard Murvin

customer_reviews.title: A Quality Nozzle
customer_reviews.text: I was going through nozzles for the garden hose every month!! till I purchased this one. It works great, doesn't leak, you don't have to worry about dropping it, and it's only $6!! I've had it for a year now, and it works like day one! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R. Tyburski

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart in 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: The lock clip is flimsy and falls off. Bought in May, fell off in August. This is the second time on the second nozzle. Buy elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Duff Man

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Dropped once now spray will not stop completely. Tried everything and can not get to stop. Very disappointed. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: woodman

customer_reviews.title: Sprays.
customer_reviews.text: It sprays, which is just what I wanted of it and just what I expected. It was a tight enough fit that it doesnt leak around the threading. It also has a locking toggle on it -- surprised the kid & now they're soaked.
customer_reviews.author: Josh S

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not so good
customer_reviews.text: I brought 2 of this item in early this year, and after 30 days use, one was not working. I contacted Amazon, they give me a replaced one. This time, I have brought 2 as well, and after 60 days, now, one of them is not working again.
customer_reviews.author: RTiggar0228

customer_reviews.title: Workd wonders...
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for work....since we use super hot water the ones they had would burn my hand...this one is perfect....its so confortable to use...and i dont feel the hot water at all anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Rodríguez

customer_reviews.title: Update 1 star!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy that, I used only 3 month,but that has broken already!look other buyer pictures,some issues!
customer_reviews.author: kevin.Liang

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: This is the only Nozzle I use for gutter cleaning. These nozzle will give you full water pressure while other filter the PSI. I tried many nozzle and these are the best. They do sell them in Lowes and Home depot in different color.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: The biggest issue I have with this nozzle is that it says it has two settings but you only get the spray if you squeeze the lever only half way down and hold it. There is no spray "setting"
customer_reviews.author: WSRut

customer_reviews.title: Really great, well made hose nozzle!
customer_reviews.text: The best feature is that the spray changes gradually from mist to a strong stream as you continue to press the lever. Hopefully the nozzle will hold up over time, but so far tis a very nice nozzle!
customer_reviews.author: Machaon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great for hot water
customer_reviews.text: Great nozzle, have two of these. One is used indoors by a large aquarium and is great for cleaning things with hot water because of the rubber insulation. Other has been outside on the hose and is holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: port fails to operate after first year
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. For one year and 3 months the speaker worked great. After that the speaker would not take the charge. I tried 4 different wires and would not charge. I called the company and they told me to switch wires but obviously that is not the problem. I don't think this product should have failed to operate after that short of a time!!
customer_reviews.author: Ah

customer_reviews.title: Hose nozzle works fine
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a well made nozzle works fine. Does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to hold and use@.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and will completely shut off which makes it very convenient for intermittent use.
customer_reviews.author: Don Hotaling

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 1 season
customer_reviews.text: Corroded where the hose hooks in and started spraying water everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Bertalan David III

customer_reviews.title: Melnor 493C Insulated Heavy-Duty Aqua-Gun Nozzle with Threaded Front
customer_reviews.text: good at the first week, now is not adjustable just one way
customer_reviews.author: Scott M

customer_reviews.title: Nice nozzle, good feel
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about a spray nozzle? Good control of spray intensity, feels good in the had. We’ll see how it lasts but so far I like it for washing car.
customer_reviews.author: dreamingat30fps

customer_reviews.title: Well made, nice pattern, doesn't leak.
customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason these are hard to find in the local stores. This is an excellent nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gilmartin

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to use
customer_reviews.text: You have to control the amount of spray using your hand. No latch. Dumped it after the first use
customer_reviews.author: GV

customer_reviews.title: QUALITYY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Costs a little more but well worth it. Has outlasted more economical choices two to three times.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miyao

customer_reviews.title: Streamer
customer_reviews.text: This heavy duty nozzle should be the last one you ever buy...
customer_reviews.author: Franco

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: Good while it lasts: Comfortable grip, good pattern. The problem is in the plastic trigger - it cracked at it's weak point which is the arch above the plunger and no longer works. Get one with a metal trigger for less.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great feel, love rubber for cold winter days!
customer_reviews.text: It's the 2nd one I bought for washing cars. The rubber keeps your hands from freezing when it gets colder outside! Like the rubber tip too so I never have to worry about it scratching anything!
customer_reviews.author: Maintenance Man

customer_reviews.title: Good nozzle that will probably last longer than the cheapies ...
customer_reviews.text: Good nozzle that will probably last longer than the cheapies I used to buy. Not the best, but very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use it daily works great
customer_reviews.text: Very well made have been using it since it came
customer_reviews.author: Victor Cortes

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a few months and although the rubber on the handle fell off the nozzle works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B.

customer_reviews.title: Had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.text: Junk. The adjustment nut slips loose so you constantly have to fiddle with the spray.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Kolstad

customer_reviews.title: OKay
customer_reviews.text: It lasted for about 2 or 3 months but did good
customer_reviews.author: De Shaud Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Feels good in the hand
customer_reviews.text: What I was expecting. Feels good in the hand, doesn't leak
customer_reviews.author: A. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy nozzle. I like the simplicity and durability of this product.
customer_reviews.author: nessa007

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Has a better quality spray adjustment lever ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Has a better quality spray adjustment lever than some others.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald H.

customer_reviews.title: terrible product
customer_reviews.text: The nossel leaked on the first day. It got me constantly wet from leaking a fine spray from the front. I was hoping on a better product. We only have 40psi.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Works good! Good water flow
customer_reviews.text: Works good! Good water flow. Can't comment on how long it will last but I like it. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Randal

customer_reviews.title: Broken less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this less than a year. The bottom plastic piece that screws into my house just fell off. It looked it was glued in place. Rey disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ardi G

customer_reviews.title: ... these nozzles at our Dairy Plant and they workers love it. We use hot low pressure water as ...
customer_reviews.text: We these nozzles at our Dairy Plant and they workers love it. We use hot low pressure water as well as cold and these nozzles work great and are very durable for daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hargrove

customer_reviews.title: I usually go through nozzles like popcorn but this one is still going
customer_reviews.text: I usually go through nozzles like popcorn but this one is still going. The secret? The trigger is all metal, not plastic that eventually cracks at the arch at the top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great. now if the wife can stop sriving over ...
customer_reviews.text: works great. now if the wife can stop sriving over the hose/
customer_reviews.author: Tyler E. Stoddard

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Had it less than a month and it's already broke.
customer_reviews.author: Piney Woods  Lodge

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Probably more heavy duty than I need but I like the flow rate.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

product_meta.title: Melnor 465C Industrial Nozzle, Basic
product_meta.description: Style:Industrial Nozzle| Color:BasicTough jobs need tough tools. The industrial nozzle is ideal for use in extreme temperatures, Either hot or cold. The metal core is durable while the thick rubberized insulation protects the hand.
feature_bullets: The industrial nozzle is ideal for use in extreme temperatures, Either hot or cold
The metal core is durable while the thick rubberized insulation protects the hand
This product is Manufactured in Taiwan
